column4: How do I check to assure grub2 is installed to MBR of Ubuntu 10.04
while using 10.04: sudo update-grub && sudo grub-install /dev/sda
theres no real working check-method, maybe just rebooting and comparing the menu with 10.04s grub.cfg
you could dump the mbr and check using "strings" for "Grub" but that won't tell you WHAT grub it contains.
